# inverse

**Type Property**

An option to invert the shape or layer alpha as the clip mask.

## Declaration

```swift
static var inverse: GraphicsContext.ClipOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

When you use this option, SwiftUI uses `1 - alpha` instead of `alpha` for the given clip shape.
title: inverse
